contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.blogpos.BlogPostContentContentMarkdown:
Wondering how you can get started using and building digital marketing solutions with Xperience by Kentico? Well, you can check out our [installation docs](https://docs.xperience.io/x/DQKQC) and the [developer tutorial](https://docs.xperience.io/x/oIjWCQ)... or you can watch this short video and be up and running in just a few minutes!
::: {.embed-container}
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/Uyr0J6Ws4R8?si=bUDTC36bwdZj0Otn" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
:::
When you're done with that you can check out the Kentico Community Portal [Resource Hub](https://community.kentico.com/resource-hub) and our documentation [Quickstart guides](https://community.kentico.com/blog/xperience-by-kentico-quickstart-guides) and continue your learning journey.
